attributes.action: Ban marital affair and cheating websites and businesses
attributes.additional_details: Affairs, especially in the case of married couples, causes huge financial loss, has an impact on employers and has an massive impact on the health and wellbeing of those involved. In the case of marriage there is a legal contract in place whilst in other cases at least a verbal contract. That organisations can exist that can so frivoulously disregard the these agreements and promote that they should be broken is a detriment to society as a whole. Both parties have a choice to be in the relationship but cheating means that one party no longer has an informed choice: in any other walk of life this would not be so readily accepted and certainly not encouraged.
